items.title: Nunu.ai raises $6M for AI agents dubbed ‘unembodied minds’ for game testing
items.description: Nunu.ai has raised $6 million and unveiled Unembodied Minds, or AI agents designed for game testing and to control any given body as needed.

items.title: Google unveils open source Gemma 3 model with 128k context window
items.description: Google's Gemma 3 is multimodal, comes in four sizes and can now handle more information and instructions thanks to a larger context window.

items.title: Sony testing AI to drive PlayStation characters
items.description: PlayStation characters may one day engage you in theoretically endless conversations, if a new internal technology video bares out.

items.title: OpenAI unveils Responses API, open source Agents SDK, letting developers build their own Deep Research and Operator
items.description: OpenAI is also making its web search, file search and computer use tools available directly through the responses API.

items.title: Anthropic’s stealth enterprise coup: How Claude 3.7 is becoming the coding agent of choice
items.description: Anthropic is positioning Claude as the LLM that matters most for enterprise companies. Claude 3.7 Sonnet, released just two weeks ago, set new benchma...
